meanings.sent1: During the briss, the baby boy is welcomed into the Jewish community.
meanings.sent2: The briss is an important tradition in the Jewish faith.
meanings.sent3: At the briss, everyone celebrated with joy and happiness.
meanings.sent4: The briss symbolizes the covenant between God and the Jewish people.
meanings.sent5: The briss ceremony is a significant event for the family.

meanings.definition: To perform a Jewish ritual circumcision.
meanings.sent1: The rabbi will briss the baby boy according to tradition.
meanings.sent2: It is customary for a mohel to briss the newborn male.
meanings.sent3: The family asked the mohel to briss their son with care.
meanings.sent4: The mohel will briss the baby boy with precision and skill.
meanings.sent5: Parents often choose a skilled mohel to briss their child.

meanings.definition: The act of circumcising a male child.
meanings.sent1: The briss involves the surgical removal of the foreskin.
meanings.sent2: Many families choose to have a briss for their sons.
meanings.sent3: The doctor performed the briss quickly and efficiently.
meanings.sent4: The briss is a common practice in many cultures.
meanings.sent5: Parents may have questions about the briss procedure.
